org.mmbase.streams.createcaches

Class Executors

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mmbase.streams.createcaches.Executors

  • public class Executors
extends Object
    This maintains a list of reusable CommandExecutor.Methods. You can obtain on unused one with getFreeExecutor(). Supposing that you are going to want to use it in a seperate thread, it also maintains ThreadPoolExecuters.
    Since:
    MMBase-1.9.6
    Author:
    Michiel Meeuwissen
